WorkItem.Description:
Test (with attached file):
----
$reader = PHPExcel_IOFactory::createReader('Excel5');
$excel = $reader->load('read.xls');
$sheet = $excel->getActiveSheet();
echo $sheet->getCell('A1')->getValue();
 
Expected result:
----
="hello""world"
 
Actual result:
----
="hello"world"
 
Environment
----
PHPExcel: Only SVN affected (Change set 18141)
WorkItem.Summary: PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5: Incorrect reading of formula with explicit string containing (escaped) double-quote
